Question.Subject: Internet connection on laptop?
Question.Content: My laptop says I have a connection to the internet but when I open my browser it says I have no connection. Any suggestions? Also, I have a connection on my desktop using the same router.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If you're running wifi on vista/xp you can going to network & sharing connection, then try repairing. If that doesn't work try disconnecting & connecting. If that doesn't work try checking your router, it probably has a plug loose that barely passes a signal.
Answer mine? http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index;_ylt=Aj.8PJFICHoiQKIUC97Gy4jsy6IX;_ylv=3?qid=20100228161319AAYxADd

Answer.Content:
If you're running wifi on vista/xp you can going to network & sharing connection, then try repairing. If that doesn't work try disconnecting & connecting. If that doesn't work try checking your router, it probably has a plug loose that barely passes a signal.
